rs.

2016/KER/46
B.KEMAL PASHA, J.
â€œCrLM.C. No. 13 of 2016
Dated this the 4" day of January, 2016
ORDER

Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner and
the learned Public Prosecutor.

2. Annexure-A2 final report in Sessions Case
No.251/2015 of the Additional Sessions Court,
Ernakulam (for the trial of cases relating to atrocities
and sexual violence against women and children) is
under challenge.

3. It seems that charge has been framed in the
matter. The offences alleged against the petitioner is
one under Section 354A(1) IPC and Section 7 read with
Section 8 of Protection of Children from Sexual
Offences Act.

4. On hearing the learned counsel for the

il
a
2016/KER/46
Crl.M.C. No. 13 of 2016
= 2:
petitioner, it has come out that the present stage is too
premature to take a view that the charges against the
petitioner will not lie in the matter. This Court is
satisfied that the matters pointed out by the learned
counsel for the petitioner can be taken up before the
court below during trial.

With liberty to the petitioner to take up the very
same questions before the court below during trial, this
Crl.M.C. is disposed of.

Sd/-
B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE
stu/04.01.2016
